Key Match Events: Ryan Mendes scored a late penalty to give Cape Verde a 1-0 win over Mauritania.
Yassin El Welly's mistake led to the penalty for Cape Verde.
Gilson Benchimol was brought down in the box, resulting in the penalty.
Mauritania competed in their first AFCON knockout game.
Pre-Game Insights: Cape Verde went into the match as favourites, having gone unbeaten on their way to the knockout stages as they topped Group B ahead of Egypt and Ghana.
Post-Match Reflections: A cruel end to a brilliant AFCON run for Mauritania.
Cape Verde have done it! They are through to the quarter-finals.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was a tight affair for much of the time.
Mauritania had edged through after stunning Algeria in their final group-stage game, for what was their first ever win at the tournament.
Others: The match was played on January 29, 2024.
